Class TextHighlighter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.xeoh.android.texthighlighter.TextHighlighter

  • public class TextHighlighter
extends java.lang.Object

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  TextHighlighter.Matcher
      Its method will be called to find position of highlighting text.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static TextHighlighter.Matcher BASE_MATCHER
      Simple Matcher which finds exactly same word.
      static TextHighlighter.Matcher CASE_INSENSITIVE_MATCHER
      Case insensitive Matcher which finds exactly same word but ignore case.

      • addTarget

        public TextHighlighter addTarget(android.view.View view)
        Add single TextView as target of current TextHighlighter.

        It sets target view only if view is instance of TextView.

        Parameters:
        view - target View
        Returns:
        itself

        Perform highlight action for targeted views.
        Parameters:
